meanings.definition: A feeling of joy or happiness.
meanings.sent1: Her face lit up with merrythoughts when she saw the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: The children's laughter filled the room with merrythoughts.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's playful antics brought merrythoughts to everyone watching.
meanings.sent4: The colorful fireworks in the night sky sparked merrythoughts in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The warm sun on her face filled her with merrythoughts of summer days.

meanings.definition: A thought or idea that brings happiness or amusement.
meanings.sent1: His mind was filled with merrythoughts of the upcoming vacation.
meanings.sent2: The silly joke gave her merrythoughts throughout the day.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a pizza party at work brought merrythoughts to the employees.
meanings.sent4: Her creative project sparked merrythoughts of endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The memory of their first date always brought him merrythoughts.
